eas_text: A civil authority has issued AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE for the following counties or areas: Gila, AZ; Arizona; Apache; Cochise; Graham; Greenlee; La Paz; Maricopa; Mohave; Navajo; Pima; Pinal; Santa Cruz; Yavapai; Yuma, AZ; at 09:13 PM ON DEC 18, 2025 Effective until 05:13 AM DEC 19, 2025. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: A SAFE Alert has been issued for Yuma County. This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. The Yuma County Sheriff is looking for 48 year old Marcy Lewis last seen on foot in area of 200 block West Court Street in Yuma.. If you have contact with this SAFE Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
